{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Compex |model=WPJ531 |revision=V1.0 |est_release_date=December 2014 |fcc_date=08/20/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf=Compex Systems |manuf_model=WPJ531LV |type=wireless embedded board |fcc_id=TK4WPJ531 |pwr_v=12-24 |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9531 |cpu1_cspeed=650 |fla1=16 |ram1=64 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |jtag=yes,, |serial=yes,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9531 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |stock_boot=Compex bootloader |stock_os=CompexWRT |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn }} '''2.4GHz 2Ã—2 Wireless Embedded Board with MiniPCI-e Slot''' [http://www.compex.com.sg/product/wpj531/ Product page] [http://www.compex.com.sg/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/WPJ531-v2.2.pdf WPJ531 Embedded Board Datasheet] ===Product highlights=== *[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz ([[MIPS 24Kc]]) CPU *64MB System Memory, 16MB NOR Flash *On-board 2.4GHz max 23dBm output power (per chain) *IEEE 802.11n compliant & backward compatible with 802.11b/g *2x2 On-board radio up to 300Mbps physical data rate *1x Mini PCI Express Slot at 9.2mm height *2x FE LAN (RJ45) with Auto-MDI/X *Passive 24V Power Over Ethernet *Integrated 48V 802.3af available as option ===Applications=== *Dual band 802.11a/b/g/n or 802.11ac/n Access Point *Single band 802.11b/g/n or 802.11a/n Access Point *Point-to-Point and Point-to-Multipoint Wireless Bridge *Wireless Base Station *Wireless Customer-Premises Equipment (CPE) *Support for Third Party 3G/LTE Radio Module ====Ordering Configuration==== 
Item Code		        Chipset	               Board Information
WPJ531LV-A 6A06PCW16F-BR-BP1	QCA9531	    2x2 802.11n 2.4GHz SoC radio with MiniPCIe slot
